channel.title: You can skip 50% of the Lambda Core coolant puzzle [Fixed]
channel.description:
I noticed this on my first playthrough:
If you flood chamber #1, go back to the previous part, then go to either chamber #1 or 2 and come back once more, you can access the next part without doing the second puzzle.
Video: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y7A4aA2fozg[/url]
I'm sorry if this has been posted, but I haven't been able to find a post about it.

item.title: You can skip 50% of the Lambda Core coolant puzzle [Fixed]

hmm, so I unfortunally skiped some part of game… I ll try to do it right

Finally, I found where to go to activate 2nd pump

item.title: You can skip 50% of the Lambda Core coolant puzzle [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: ZeFish
item.description:
I noticed this on my first playthrough:

If you flood chamber #1, go back to the previous part, then go to either chamber #1 or 2 and come back once more, you can access the next part without doing the second puzzle.

Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y7A4aA2fozg

I’m sorry if this has been posted, but I haven’t been able to find a post about it.
